Unless otherwise noted, we meet on the second Thursday at 4-5pm in C1. 

## Fall 2018

```{r, echo=FALSE, comment=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

schedule = matrix(NA, nrow = 100, ncol = 3)
colnames(schedule) = c("Date", "Presenters", "Title")

schedule[1,] = c("December 13, 2018", "Elizabeth Mauer", "Workflow and Organization for Collaboration")
schedule[2,] = c("January 10, 2019", "TBA", "TBA")

schedule = schedule[!is.na(schedule[,1]),]

kable(schedule, row.names = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped") %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "5em")
```

If there are topics you'd like (us) to cover, please let us know!
